Name: Big Larry
About the game: BIG LARRY is a single player survival/thriller horror game, packed with immersive content! Play as a deliquent high school student meeting up with their best friend Ricky, for whats meant to be a fun night at Creek High.. Unfortunately, this gets you trapped inside with something dangerousâ€¦ Look out for clues, pick up items, solve puzzles, and hide in lockers! Survive the night at Creek High and find an exit all while Big Larry is close behind! Creek High Creek High has become a nightmare of a school ever since the school mascot BIG LARRY was found dead. The kids say its a myth but your about to put that myth to a test when you and your friend meet up at Creek High during one dark foggy night.. Heart Pumping Content Escape Creek High Solve Puzzles Stay quiet.. stay alert and DO NOT DISTURB the angry school mascot! Contact Information Support: kaidastudios@riseup.net
